content.prompt: Which of the following is a correct conclusion that can be drawn based only on the data in Figure 4?

choices.label: Seedling growth rates decrease between 50 and 80 days after planting at all concentrations of the inhibitor.
The greater the inhibition of GAl synthesis, the lower the plant height after 80 days.
The spraying of GAl on seedlings results in an increase in seedling growth rates.
The inhibitor kills the seedlings when it is applied in very high concentrations.
The growth of the seedlings is directly proportional to the concentrations of inhibitor.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
